tests.name: Quiz - QUESTIONS.txt
tests.description: Check if the answers in QUESTIONS.txt are correct. This file must be edited so that the correct ( ) choices are replaced with (X) and no other changes are made to the file.

tests.name: Code - pipe_sum 1
tests.description: Runs the pipe_sum program on the file numbers.txt. Checks correctness of cumulative sums printed out by parent process.

tests.name: Code - pipe_sum 2
tests.description: Runs the pipe_sum program on the file numbers2.txt. Checks correctness of cumulative sums printed out by parent process.
